`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

The third of the four stages of life according to the [[Hinduism|Hindu]] tradition, the Vanaprastha [[Ashram]] involves applying your skills for the benefit of other people.
^[[Dr. K's Guide to Mental Health](https://coaching.healthygamer.gg/guide)]

**See**:: [[Sannyasa Ashram]], [[Grahastha Ashram]], [[Brahmacharya Ashram]]
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
